lines.text: Ain't you forgettin' this is my property?

[with gun pointed at Tom]
Ain't you forgettin' this is my gun?
Tom, why don't you own up - that cat's too smart for you. Take a better shot than you're ever gonna be to collect that bounty
[he shoots Gil's hat from his hand]
You ever do that again, Tom Eggers and I'm gonna split your back open
If I ever do it again, I won't be aiming at your hat
